item.title: Dead Code and Sentimental Value: Why We Keep What We Should Delete
item.description: A deep dive into why software teams struggle to delete unnecessary code and how the psychology of sentimental value affects engineering decisions.

item.title: Can We Spot the Human in a Room Full of Randomness?
item.description: A fascinating thought experiment: can we detect human patterns in what should be pure randomness? Exploring the differences between true randomness and human intuition through simulation.

item.description: Ever wondered what happens when you ask ChatGPT a question? Dive into the fascinating world of how AI language models generate responses through pretraining, fine-tuning, and reinforcement learning.
